paragraphs: With Christmas approaching—quickly, we might add!—there are precious few days left to shop for last-minute gifts. Whether you don’t have time to make it to the store or you simply want to avoid the overwhelming crowds of fellow procrastinators, we’ve gathered a list of very stylish last-minute gifts from shops offering free shipping that guarantees to get your gifts under the tree before Christmas Eve with just a few clicks.

Of course, the only thing that really matters is snagging a jaw-dropping find. Below, a Vogue-approved lineup of treasures and trinkets that are sure to impress even your most jaded friend or family member. Holiday shopping has never been so easy.
Order by Tuesday, December 17, and select two-day shipping. Shipping times may vary by merchandise.
